divs: Sighting Detailsmy son and i went outside about 1:15am to see if there were any metors in the sky. around 1:30am we witnessed a bright orangey red long flash of light that caught our eye then seemed to dart off in a triangle pattern at what would be each point of the triagle the light long flashed on it fourth flash my son witnessed it dart off with a trail of light. i did not see that i was trying to look through binoculars to see if i could see it better. We were a little taken back, saying to each other did we just see what we thought we just saw.
Summary: 3 flashes of orange light in triangle pattern the took off with flash
